title: Pokemon Live Wallpaper
content:
One of the most advertised new features of the new Pixel 4 is the Pokemon live wallpapers.  My Pixel 4 arrived today, however they are not listed.  My understanding is they should appear in Styles & Wallpapers under "Live Wallpapers" but there is nothing there.  I've also looked in "Coming Alive" and it's not listed there either.

I've researched online and tried a few things with no success:

- Confirmed I'm running the latest version of Android.
- Upgraded Motion Sense Bridge app in Google Play.
- Installed "Pokemon Wave Hello" App in Google Play.
- Completed the tutorial in the "Pokemon Wave Hello" App.
- Restarted the phone several times.

Can anyone help?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
